content:
Hi @AbdulMalik Shakir , @Pete Krautscheid , @Sarah MacAdam , @Saul Kravitz
I m using PHIN code from this link https://phinvads.cdc.gov/vads/ViewValueSet.action?oid=2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.6002
for manner of death.
But didnt find code for "Therapeutic Complication" . What should be code for this manner of death ?

Thanks
Wesley

Hi @Wesley - This is really a question for the IG author @AbdulMalik Shakir . In the interest of time, I'll make a suggestion.

The options here are Natural, Accident, Suicide, Homicide, pending Investigation, or Could not be determined.

I would suggest Natural. The IG should contain more narrative information on how to use the codes in this value set, covering cases like the one you are asking about. * @Jenny Couse

Saul Kravitz said:

Hi Wesley - This is really a question for the IG author AbdulMalik Shakir . In the interest of time, I'll make a suggestion.

The options here are Natural, Accident, Suicide, Homicide, pending Investigation, or Could not be determined.

I would suggest Natural. The IG should contain more narrative information on how to use the codes in this value set, covering cases like the one you are asking about. * Jenny Couse

Thanks @Saul Kravitz
